reviews.title: Pantene Moisture Shampoo review
reviews.review_text: Everyone tells you that Pantene is a brand known for its affordable but substandard products but is that true? People look at Pantene and ask “why are there so many ingredients just to do one simple thing?” The question I want to answer is: “are all the ingredients in Pantene's products needed?” My goal here today is to explain what each ingredient is and for you to decide if there are still too many ingredients. The first hair product I researched is the Pantene Moisture Shampoo. There are 16 ingredients (not including water and fragrance) all doing something important. To make this simple, I will be grouping products depending on what they do. The first group is preservatives. They make sure that the hair product doesn't grow mold and bacteria.There are 5 different preservatives: Trisodium citrate Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Tetrasodium EDTA Sodium benzoate Methylisothiazolinone. These 5 ingredients work together to help preserve your shampoo so it is safe to use. If there weren't any preservatives, you could get bacterial breakouts on your scalp and could develop fungal diseases. The second group is different types of conditioners. These are products that help heal and condition hair. There aren't as many conditioning agents in shampoo as there are in conditioner but having them can still drastically impact your hair's health. In this category there are 7 different ingredients: Panthenol Citricum Salicylate Cocamidopropyl Betaine Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride Histidine, Cocamide MEA. These ingredients help counteract the damaging effects of striping your hair of all its oils. Sulfates are amazing cleaning agents because they get rid of everything, putting back moisture and oil will leave your hair not only feeling clean, but also healthy. The last category is cleaning agents. These products are there to help remove dirt and oil. Your scalp constantly creates sebum or oil and if you don't remove it, it will start clogging your hair follicles. This can lead your hair to stop growing . It can also affect how healthy the ends of your hair are because new hair isn't growing. There are 4 ingredients in this group, but 2 of them are there to improve the texture of your hair. These ingredients are Sodium chloride Sodium laureth sulfate Glycol distearate Lauramidopropyl betaine. It is a common misconception that sulfates are bad but if you have ever used shampoo with sulfates you have probably noticed that your hair feels a lot cleaner. You might have even noticed that it looks and feels more healthy. This is because your hair is getting cleaned better. The oil your hair produces is important, but an excess of oils will damage your hair. If you have had better results by using a product that doesn't have any sulfates, then by all means keep on using it. Not all products work the same on everyone, but, if you don't feel like you have been getting a good wash or your hair gets oily really quick, you might think about switching to a shampoo with sulfates. Overall, knowing what is in your hair products and what each ingredient does is super important. I hope you came away from this review knowing that there is a reason for each ingredient that goes into a hair product and not to judge something before you buy it. Resources: https://incidecoder.com/products/pantene-daily-moisture-renewal-shampoo https://www.cosmeticsinfo.org/ingredient/lauramidopropyl-betaine/ https://atamankimya.com/sayfalar.asp?LanguageID=2&cid=3&id=3322&id2=11199#:~:text=Ethylene%20glycol%20distearate%20is%20used%20in%20creams%2C%20lotions%2C%20and%20moisturizers,and%20provides%20a%20pearlescent%20appearance.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love how smooth this shampoo makes my hair. I have long thick hair and it is usually hard to brush with this stuff it makes my hair alot smoother and it feels healthier and not as dry and frizzy. Need to buy more of

reviews.title: Great Product!
reviews.review_text: I bought this in a travel size and was amazed at how clean and soft my hair is! I've used so many shampoos and conditioners that left my hair dry and oily most of them cost an arm and a leg. I thought I would stay away from the cheap shampoos because they are the ones that usually don't work as well on my hair. Then, I found Pantene moisture renewal and am just in awe! It smells wonderful too! I highly recommend if you've got damaged, dry, color treated hair! Would give it more stars if I could!

reviews.title: Why did you change the formula
reviews.review_text: Pantene changed the “ look” but also changed the formula. I got the new 72 hour lush shampoo moisture renewal, and it dried my hair out and also burned my scalp and it itches so bad. The old formula didn't do that and had been using it for years. I just ran out of the old formula that says 24 hour moisture. I got the new formula today and experienced this. I don't know what to do now. Why fix something that doesn't need fixed. Bring back the old formula.

I buy the Shampoo and conditioner both. I love how Pantene cleans my hair. I mean really cleans it!!! I don't use the conditioner immediately after washing my hair. I wait until I am done with everything else in my Shower. And i have a hard bristle brush and My conditioner. After i work the conditioner into my hair really, really well. I get my brush while conditioner is still in my hair. And I brush through it just like i would if it was dry. I part it like i wear it and brush it back and down . And when I go to rinse it? I use the brush under the water and brush it out as I rinse it. It comes out smooth and silky. And if you think you might still have a bit of conditioner left in it. stand under shower and get your hair like your going to put it up in a ponytail and pull it down to tips of hair. Do several times until feels clear.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo does a great job getting my hair clean and feeling soft and smooth. I have bleached blond hair and earlier this year I went from dark hair to platinum blond which required several bleaching sessions. This left my hair dry and damaged feeling and looking. I also have oily hair up by the scalp and extremely dry, damaged hair at the ends due to the bleaching. This shampoo has saved my hair and has brought new life to it. It cleans up the oily scalp and makes the ends look smooth and shiny. It doesn't make my hair feel weighed down and the light fragrance lasts all day and smells amazing. I am very happy with this shampoo and how my hair looks and will be continuing to use it.

I have no complaints on this shampoo. It did what it was supposed to.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love using this Pantene conditioner. It makes my hair feel so refreshed and rejuvenated. I love the scent that it possessed when I am washing it. It is so easy to apply to my hair and leaves my hair feeling smooth

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love using Pantene on my hair and this moisture renewal shampoo really was great. It made my hair feel so soft and kept that feeling throughout the day. Using it with the conditioner was beneficial as well.

reviews.title: Love
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pantene products are a favorite of mine. My hair requires quite a bit of moisture and the daily moisture renewal shampoo works best for me. It adds the hydration needed back to my hair. Leaving it silky, not greasy.

reviews.title: Great title
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pantene is good for black hair. I still have white around my edges and its itchy. Hair not as smooth. I guess i need to get a perm before i use this shampoo or conditioner. I will still recommend this.

reviews.title: Great Shampoo!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like the Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo. It spreads easily in my hair and cleans my thoroughly without having to use alot. It also rinses out easily without leaving residues. This shampoo has a nice light scent. It never leaves my hair feeling weighed down. My hair always feel moist and soft after using it.

reviews.title: Perfect Daily use Shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Perfect shampoo for daily use. Leaves the hair shiny and silky. Perfect for dry hair as this helps in nourishing and retain the moisture in the hair. Leaves the hair and scalp clean and fresh. Smells good. Would recommend this shampoo.

reviews.title: Terrible!
reviews.review_text: Tried this since my go-to shampoo recently changed its formula. I have delicate, fine, dry hair. The shampoo 100% stripped my hair of all moisture. The conditioner does not have enough moisture in it to replace what was stripped out. Could barely work the conditioner through my hair. This is just a very cheap drug store shampoo and nothing more. Doesn't even do what it says.

reviews.title: So nice
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have used so many different shampoo and conditioners and this one is pretty good! Is it my absolute favorite? No but overall I like it! My hair is soft and shiny after use and doesn't feel like it has a thick coating on it

reviews.title: Pantene Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pantene Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo is one of the best shampoos out there.it hydrates as well as moisturizes my hair well and keeps them soft for quite some time too. It smells great, and it works well. I would highly recommend giving it a try.

reviews.title: Great shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo has a great scent and definitely gives a good cleanse. I love how it suds up and gives me the feeling of really clean. I also love that I can find it almost anywhere.

reviews.title: Smells great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Pantene shampoo really does smell great but I've noticed that it dries out hair and or kind of looks lifeless to be honest. I only wash my hair maybe twice a week and I don't use a hair blow dryer. I don't think it's best for people with fine hair.

reviews.title: Best shampoo for dry hair
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo definitely is the best moisturizing shampoo in the market. It keeps my hair soft and shiny for about 72 hours. It keeps hair protected from frizz and dryness. The bottle doesn't come with a pump, it would be convenient to have apump bottle.

reviews.title: Love Pantene!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love Pantene products and Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal shampoo is no exception. It’s easy to lather and you work throughout your entire hair. It’s easy to rinse and it feels clean and refreshing when it’s out. I love it!

reviews.title: Works just like it says!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo smells amazing and leaves my hair feeling silky smooth! Usually my hair starts feeling broken and damaged a couple months after getting a cut and color but I have not had that issue since using this! Whenever I use this shampoo I feel like I left the salon! My husband even prefers using it over his Mens shampoo!

reviews.title: good stuff
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I never have really strong opinions about shampoo. I just need something that effectively cleans my hair without drying it out. And this does a decent job. All Pantene products have that soft smell which I love.

reviews.title: Amazing hair care
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I absolutely love this pan teen pro V shampoo the line is so wonderful I love the way that my hair shines after using this product at pairs very nicely with the conditioner and using both of them even for just a couple days has really shown such a great improvement on my hair

reviews.title: Great shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] There is a pleasant fragrance to this shampoo, and it lathers enough for you to be able to tell if you have thoroughly applied it to your scalp and hair. It is a sparkly white color with just the right consistency. It left the hair feeling clean without making it feel waxy, or heavy. The bottle is nice, and simple. The lid opens, and closes easily. It stayed in place even after being knocked over in the shower, too. Great experience.

reviews.title: Great Smell
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have extremely thick wavy hair, so usually I need a product that I can use a lot of but doesn't clog up my hair either. This shampoo is great for that. I put on a good amount for the first wash and it did not get sudsy but I felt it was lifting up a lot of the buildup. The second wash right after it was sudsy and at this point I could smell the product. It smells really good which makes me feel even more clean. Overall it was a positive and clean experience.

reviews.title: Pantene shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Naturally my hair is very dry, and I dye my hair so it tends to get a little damaged. I've been trying the Pantene moisturizer shampoo and it has really brought my hair back to life. My hair has been easier to brush. Looks less dry and feels great. It even moisturizes my scalp creating less itchy dry scalp. And just remember a little goes a long way you Don't need a lot. I do like the smell of the shampoo but it's a little too potent.

reviews.title: Works great for the whole family!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Our family really liked using the Pantene Pro V daily moisture renewal shampoo. The shampoo was very effective and definitely helped with dryness and gave our hair some added moisture. We will definitely be using this product again.

reviews.title: Good scent
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Shampoo smells great! It creates nice suds to wash my hair. With that comes a better chance of getting it in your eyes. I know that could happen with any shampoo but for some reason it happened every time and my eyes did not feel great even after washing them out more than a few times.

reviews.title: Smells so good!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have to say that before trying this shampoo my hair was dry and had no volume. I absolutely love the way this shampoo leaves my hair feeling so soft and it smells so good. Definitely a new go to shampoo for myself and my children.

reviews.title: Left my hair feeling nice and clean
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The moisture renewal shampoo worked great for me. The shampoo left no sticky residue behind when I washed. The shampoo did not make my hair even more tangle as other shampoos do. The shampoo has a nice light scent that is not overbearing. If you are interested in trying this shampoo then I would say that you should.

reviews.title: Smells so good !
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This conditioner makes my hair smell so good and it also makes my hair soft . Pantene is my go to for my hair product . I do dye my hair a lot and my hair gets dry and brittle this conditioner definitely brings life to my hair .

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got this about a month ago. It made my hair feel so much cleaner and loved how soft it was. It smells so good during and after left my so silky and shinny. I love this and will definitely buy this again

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have a lot of fine, straight, color treated hair. Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo lathered right up with only a small amount, which means less waste and your money goes further! The shampoo smells great too. I’ve been using it for a few weeks now, after every shower/wash, my hair feels clean, moisturized and is nice and shinny. I’ll keep using this shampoo for sure!

reviews.title: Smells great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I usually stick with my old tried-and-true but my hair has been becoming a little bit dry lately so I thought I would try this. It smells good and at least my hair easier to manage. You don’t need a whole lot of product to get a good hair wash.

reviews.title: Love Pantene
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pantene is already such a household favorite brand for me so I am happy to have this shampoo in my guest bath for a quality product for anyone that visits us. Great smell and great texture and definitely a nice quality!

reviews.title: Smells great and transform hair
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am a huge Pantene fan, although there are some that say it's not great for your hair. This helped with repairing my hair and using the shampoo correctly and massaging it into your scalp truly is what is key. I highly recommend the Pantene renewal not only for results but also scent.

reviews.title: Great shampoo!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a great shampoo! It cleans my hair really well and takes that oily feel away. It leaves my hair feeling soft and smooth and helps keep the frizz away. My hair is natural curly and long but I only have to use a small amount to wash my hair good. It doesn’t have a strong fragrance so I really like that. I do prefer the pump bottle but this squeeze bottle is good too! It doesn’t allow a bunch to pour out which is awesome for me.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Everyone should use this Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo!! It smells amazing and leaves your hair feeling super smooth! My daughter's and I LOVE it!! We recommend it to everyone all the time!

reviews.title: Smells amazing
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This makes my hair smell so good and is so soft. My family has been using this and we will continue to because we all love it. My hair is long and color treated and I haven't noticed any fading or dryness.

reviews.title: Slick and soft
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I bought this to see if it would help split and damaged ends, and I am obsessed with this shampoo! Works so good, and has a really great smell. My hair has basically been fried from all the hair color I've used, but this shampoo makes it look brand new!

reviews.title: Fresh and Clean
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo works well and smells good. I have bleached dry and brittle hair. It makes my hair soft shiny and manageable. It has a good lather and left my hair feeling clean. A little goes a long way. I highly recommend!

reviews.title: Great shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a great moisturizing shampoo, especially for those of us that deal will cooler weather drying our hair out. It has a good feel to it, without being greasy. The smell is good as well. Definitely a good product.

reviews.title: Pro Hair Wash!!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo leaves my hair smelling and feeling great! I love how easily it lathers up and works throughout my hair! It does come out of the bottle quick so be ready!

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo & conditioner leaves my hair feeling smooth and shiny without that greasy oily texture. I love this Pantene combo and have been using it regularly and plan to continue doing so! I have very thick dark hair that gets oily quickly so a shampoo : conditioner that honors the shine without showing grease is an A in my book.

reviews.title: Great shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have dyed hair so I'm pretty particular about my shampoo. Most shampoos leave my hair dry and brittle. This shampoo left my hair soft and moisturized and manageable. I'm not an every day shampooer so this shampoo fits right into that.

reviews.title: Great Quality Shampoo!!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pantene pro-v daily moisture renewal shampoo is a great quality shampoo! This shampoo has no parabens or colorants in it and it does no harsh stripping. It cleans parched hair in need of moisture and helps to remove buildup. It has protective anti-oxidants, pro-vitamin b5 and ph balancers. It is also safe for use on color treated hair and chemically treated hair. This shampoo left my hair feeling very clean, soft and lightweight. It was easy to wash out without any residue left behind. Overall I would highly recommend to give this shampoo a try!

reviews.title: Great quality
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I recently got this and I'm so glad I did. As someone who is getting older, one of my biggest problems is how your hair changes as you get older. I loved the moisture that this shampoo gave me. My hair felt great.

reviews.title: Refreshing clean
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The shampoo has an amazing smell and leaves my hair feeling extra clean and refreshed. It lathers really nice too. My hair felt less tangled compared to other shampoos. And got all of the hairspray out of my hair in one wash.

reviews.title: Love the smell & provides great moisture!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The smell of the shampoo is amazing. It's clean and fresh without the artificial smelling fruity or floral jazz. It smells so clean. It also doesn't take a lot to wash hair with. A small drop goes a long way. Definitely provides moisture when paired with conditioner. Makes my hair feel soft and gives it a slight shine instead of leaving it dry and brittle! A new favorite

reviews.title: Nice lather, pleasant scent
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The first thing I noticed about this shampoo was the nice, pleasant scent. It's not too strong, but lingers nicely on my hair. The next thing I noticed was the way this lathers up while washing! My hair was very soft for a few days after washing. I believe this is a good quality shampoo.

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo was pretty average and similar to many already on the market. I found that this product caused buildup in my hair, which weighed it down and made it look greasy quicker. It is definitely Not one to use if you already have buildup.

reviews.title: My fave!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love Pantene products. They always do such a good job of making my hair look beautiful. This shampoo does a great job washing product out of my hair and keeping it looking clean longer. It smells so good and leaves my hair feeling hydrated!

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Pantene pro-v daily moisture renewal shampoo works great. It leaves my hair feel and look smooth and healthy. The scent is strong but not overpowering. I noticed the difference in my hair after a few uses.

reviews.title: Solid choice
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Quality go to drugstore shampoo when the salon stuff is out of budget or unavailable. It has a good scent and is thick enough coming out of the bottle that it doesn't feel like I'm paying for mostly water.

reviews.title: Love my hair
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been using this shampoo for several days and I really loved it, if the aroma is so delicious, if the consistency is not so thick but not so liquid, it is perfect for all types of hair, the results are excellent from the first application you realize and you feel your hair softer and more manageable, the best thing is that the whole family can use it

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got this moisture renewal shampoo a couple of weeks ago and so far it has worked great! I have noticed a difference in my hair after only a couple of weeks. It works great with the combination of the moisture renewal conditioner.

reviews.title: Smells Great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I tried out Pantene - Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo and it smells so good! My hair felt super clean and not weighted down because there's no bad stuff in there to weigh it down. My hair was shiny clean!

reviews.title: Great shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been using this shampoo the last couple weeks and I am very happy that I decided to try this one. It lathers very nicely and my hair feels nice and clean after just one wash without any tangles

reviews.title: Great shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love the line of Pantene products! I've always kinda had dry hair, but more so here lately. I think it's the weather. I tried this shampoo and it's a keeper. It cleans your hair without taking the moisture out of it. My hair feels so refreshed after using it.

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this product as a promotion and I just love Pantene. First of it smells amazing and it made my hair so smooth and sleek and shiny. Definitely will be buying this product more in the future.

reviews.title: Great hair products!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am really happy with the thick and full feeling Pantene gives my hair. It smells amazing, gives my hair a great shine and feels clean, with no buildup. I have always had trouble with other products leaving my hair too dry or too greasy, but Pantene has my hair feeling great after just a week of use!! Would definitely recommend!!

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've used this daily moisture renewal shampoo for about two weeks now and I can visibly see a difference-my hair is not dry, it's super hydrated. The scent is refreshing, and light...a bit different from their signature scent. This shampoo hydrates your hair in every wash.This shampoo is safe to use on color treated hair and removes build up. Follow up with the daily moisture renewal conditioner and you'll be good to go!

reviews.title: good lather but didn't work for me
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo lathers up well and quickly. It also feels great during the shampoo. It rinses out well and there's a good weigh to it as you lather. Unfortunately for my hair it didn't really work. It left it drier and as a result frizzier. My curls weren't defined and it made my hair easy to knot. I'm hoping with more consistent use this doesn't continue

reviews.title: The smell, texture and moisture is SUPERB!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've never been a huge fan of Pantene but figured I'd give this a try. At first glance it's nothing special but the smell whisked me away immediately. The texture and lather it had it my hair was beyond relaxing. My scalp was left moisturized and without the dull pain of dryness other companies have. I'll certainly be buying another bottle after this one.

reviews.title: Heaven
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got to try this free and it smells amazing looking for a good shampoo or conditioner this would be it smells very very good makes your.hair very soft and silky don't look for another kind because this is it!

reviews.title: Very hydrating!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This Pantene Pro-v Daily Moisture Renewal shampoo is hydrating and moisturizing! Especially in winter, my hair gets dry and my scalp gets build-up. This hydrated well without residue or greasing. No frizziness, just soft, silky hair!

reviews.title: Works Well
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was sent a bottle of Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo by the TryIt Sampling Community to test and review. I've tried other Pantene shampoos in the past and have always like them for their affordability, effectiveness, and how they affect my hair. This shampoo is no different. Not the super best out there, but most will be able to afford it. My hair looks much better and is no longer dry and fly away. The bottle is a nice size and will last for quite some time. I would recommend it.

reviews.title: Makes my hair beautiful
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am delighted with the performance of Pantene Pro-V's Daily Moisture Renewal shampoo. It will give you the best result when used with its coordinating conditioner. In my opinion, the scent is mild and not overly perfumed. It lathers strongly and rinses easily. Hair is left very clean, yet moisturized; reduction in frizz was noticeable with this product, and it is one of its strong suits. My hair feels silky and strong! I'm thrilled with this shampoo and use it regularly now, as it works well with my hair type, but I do wish the product's cap would be re-designed, as it broke easily with a drop from a low height (2 feet).

reviews.title: Great Shampoo!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pantene - Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo is really perfect for daily use as my hair is clean, shiny and full of volume! It feels great on my scalp and the smell is fragrant but not too overpowering.

reviews.title: Great Shampoo!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo is really great! I swim a few times a week so my hair tends to get very dry and coarse. This shampoo restored moisture to my hair. My hair is now much softer and looks healthier. Since I have been using it, my hair is easier to style and looks much nicer. I also love that it can be used for color and chemically treated hair. I love this shampoo and the conditioner that goes with it. Give it a try. You will not be disappointed!

reviews.title: Great shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am impressed with this shampoo. Pantene is not a brand I typically go for however using this shampoo has convinced me to buy it next time I shop. The soap foams up and creates a great lather for my hair. The smell is perfect, not too over powering but still smells great day after shower. I wish I could describe the scent perfectly but to me it smells like a light clean refreshing scent. My hair typically gets oily the day after and I do not see a difference with this shampoo but that's just my hair/hormonal issues I think. I will deffinatly buy this product in the future.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product is absolutely amazing. It smell like fruit. And I absolutely love it. It has helped my hair tremendously. It is very easy to use. It make my hair feel refreshed and renewed and replenish.

reviews.title: Beautiful hair
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love how clean this pantene pro v shampoo makes my hair. It smells amazing and just feels clean for days after showering. It has the perfect feel in my hair while showering so that I know how long to rinse it out. I see a big improvement in my hair and I really think its from pantenes pro v.

reviews.title: Love this shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I absolutely love this moisture renewal shampoo. It really helps my over-processed damaged hair. It feels super clean. It also smells really good. Pantene is my go-to brand and the moisture renewal is my favorite line.

reviews.title: My hair smells amazing!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I absolutely love the scent of this shampoo (and conditioner)! The quality is comparable to Dove, but at a more affordable price point. The scent is on the stronger side, but that’s what I prefer. And it’s thick so you don’t need to use a ton of it each time you wash your hair!

reviews.title: Inexpensive
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The shampoo did a great job at removing excess oil and moisturizing my hair. The shampoo smells pleasant and it only takes a little as it lathers well. My hair looks shiny and sleek when dry, but felt weighted down. After a few uses, my hair had a waxy-like build up which ended up making my hair look oilier. However, my hair felt a lot softer and shinier than normal. Overall, this is a good choice if you're looking for a shampoo that maintains moisture and removes excess oils, while leaving your hair shiny and sleek

reviews.title: Good shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got this for my boyfriend a few weeks ago and I must say that I love it because it makes his hair so soft and smooth and it helps with his dandruff which is something that he has always had a problem with and he likes it for the same reasons so all in all a great product

reviews.title: Great Lather
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love Pantene products and have been using them for most of my life. This shampoo is great it lathers very well and make my hair feel very clean, I also love the scent it also lasts and smells so good!

reviews.title: Refreshing Scent
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo smells great. I have hair past my shoulders and use only about a quarter size amount of shampoo. It foams up nicely and easily rinses out. I also like that it’s safe for color treated hair.

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My hair is usually dry, and it takes a lot of oil and products to moisturize my hair. My hair usually isn’t fully moisturized until 4 or 5 days after it’s been washed and has had products added daily. Well after using this shampoo, my curls were popping the same day!!! I still had to add moisturizer to my hair, but this shampoo really helps if you have dry hair.

reviews.title: Clean hydrated hair
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have tried so many shampoos that claim they will moisturize dry hair. Barely any have lived up to that claim except for Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo. After the first use I saw a difference in my hair it was not rough and I could easily brush it. What's great is that if doesn't make your hair look greasy or feel weighed down. If you're looking for a shampoo to add moisture to your dry brittle hair this is it!

reviews.title: My Hair Feels Great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using this shampoo and my hair has never felt better! It lathers very well so I don't have to use much. I have long, thin hair so it can be challenging to find a moisturizing shampoo that doesn't weigh my hair down. I don't have that problem at all with this shampoo! It makes my hair so soft and manageable. Plus it smells so good!

reviews.title: Shinier hair
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The shampoo helped me one problem I had. My hair is super oily at the roots and super dry at the ends. This shampoo moisturized my hair from the roots to the ends that the hair started to look healthier. The scent of the shampoo is great. I had to squeeze only a small amount of the shampoo on to my hands to complete washing. My hair is now shiny and silky.

reviews.title: Made my hair soft
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was impressed with this daily shampoo. It has a light scent and washes out easily, but doesn't coat my hair like some of shampoos I have tried in the past. Has a light clean scent. Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Offers great clean & scent
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really enjoyed the scent of this shampoo. It's a good consistency as well that isn't running all over the place. It offers a really great clean and leaves my hair feeling lightweight. Great product.

reviews.title: Amazing shampoo!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I’ve been looking for a shampoo that’s not harsh and strips my hair and damages it, and this hasn’t. My hair stay healthy and moisturized. I’m loving my hair now and it actually stays moisturized and smelling great, too!

reviews.title: Good moisture and smells great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like this shampoo. It smells so good. I love the way my hair smells long after it’s dry. This shampoo is definitely moisturizing, but it’s a little too moisturizing for me. My hair stays clean but starts to get greasier sooner than when I use other brands or formulas. This is still a great product though, and my hair feels soft and silky when I use it. I’d use it again but will just have to wash my hair sooner than later. Nice amount of product in the bottle, too, and I like that it’s all plastic so I can easily recycle the container.

reviews.title: Clean silky feel
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been using this shampoo for almost a month now. I like the gentle scent and the soft feel of the shampoo on my hair. It does a great job at cleaning my hair and leaving it feeling fresh, silky, and smooth. The shampoo does not leave any residue and washes off clean. The hair looks healthy, moisturized, and shiny.

reviews.title: Very Soft Hair and Clean Hair
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo has a pleasant scent and lathers well.  It left my hair tangle free, hydrated and soft.  I also like that my hair didn't feel weighed down.  It felt very clean.  My only problem with the product is that it didn't leave my hair silky.  My hair was soft and bouncy but it had no healthy shine to it.  I do have very dry hair so perhaps with continued use that might change.  Overall a very good shampoo though.

reviews.title: Clean feeling
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo works so well, it makes my hair feel clean and refreshed, my scalp also feels really clean after use. This shampoo does not give me dandruff or make my head itchy at all and most shampoos do make my scalp itch.

reviews.title: Lather
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love a good lather and pantene pro-v daily moisture renewal shampoo did not disappoint. Some shampoos leave your hair feeling dry as you rinse but this shampoo left my hair soft. My hair was not frizzy after my hair dryed. Great product.

reviews.title: Daily shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is my daily shampoo and conditioner. It's super gentle for daily use. I love how it makes my hair soft and shiny after showering. It's also very moisturising and is great for dry scalp especially in winters!!

reviews.title: Thumbs up
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love everything Pantene. When I got this I was super content because Pantene works really well in my hair and it reacts nicely to it. I also love the smell of it. Many shampoos and conditioners have a funky smell to them, but I didnt find that with this.

reviews.title: Nice Shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Happy with my Pantene Moisturize Renewal Shampoo. The shampoo smells great and has my hair feeling really clean! If you purchase you won't be disappointed with the shampoo Pantene delivers again. Comes in big nice size bottle

reviews.title: Clean and soft hair
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My hair is thin and dry. Pantne pro-v shampoo gives my hair some life! It lathers well and washes out easily. I let my hair air dry. It left my hair soft and smelling good. It gave it some much needed bounce.

reviews.title: So good!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got Pantene Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo just to try something different and I was pleasantly surprised! It smells absolutely amazing, made my hair so shiny and silky, and it also improved the health of my hair.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo is a good shampoo for moisturizing your hair and smells very good. This shampoo leaves your hair very very soft and the smell lasts for a very long time after taking a shower. You don't need very much either

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] To be perfectly honest the shampoo does the job to make the hair a little softer. It is a good product as it does moisture the hair too. The product does not have a funky smell or anything else like that. It does what it's set out to do
